articles.title: Nick McGlashan, 'Deadliest Catch' cast member, dies at 33 - CNN
articles.description: Nick McGlashan, who starred on the hit reality series "Deadliest Catch," has died in Nashville, the Davidson County Medical Examiner confirmed to CNN on Monday.
articles.content:
(CNN)Nick McGlashan, who starred on the hit reality series "Deadliest Catch," has died in Nashville, the Davidson County Medical Examiner confirmed to CNN on Monday.

articles.title: Lori Loughlin had 'tearful' reunion with daughters amid release from prison after serving two months - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 56-year-old actress was emotional as she returned to her children in Los Angeles on Monday and is 'beyond relieved that she can put her prison sentence behind her', a source told People .
articles.content:
Lori Loughlin had a 'tearful' reunion with her daughters Olivia Jade, 21, and Bella Rose, 22, amid her release from prison after serving two months over the college admissions scandal.
